DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate influence fitness program application Pilates lung function , thoracoabdominal mobility respiratory muscle strength woman .
DOC.detailed_description: Study Cardiorespiratory Physiotherapy laboratory clinic Pilates region , voluntary Pilates group would start Pilates method . The study include woman body mass index ( BMI ) ≤ 29 kg/m2 engage regular physical activity , sedentary lifestyle score eight , accord Baecke et al. , non-smoker , non-alcoholic , without abnormality cardiovascular , respiratory neuromuscular . The study exclude woman disable disease , pregnancy , postpartum less year , inability understand test exercise propose refuse participate study . The volunteer , age 25 55 year , allocate two group : 1 . Pilates Group ( n = 16 ) : sedentary volunteer , would begin activity Pilates method evaluate three month . 2 . Control group ( n = 13 ) : sedentary volunteer remain sedentary evaluate three month .
DOC.criteria: body mass index ( BMI ) ≤ 29 kg/m2 physically active regular basis , ie , sedentary lifestyle score eight , accord Baecke et al . nonsmoker nonalcoholic without abnormality cardiovascular , respiratory neuromuscular disabling disease gestation puerperium less year inability understand test exercise propose
